title: Record Patient Fall in Therapy
description: A patient falls during a physical therapy session. The therapist must document the event.

tasks.description: Ensure the patient is safe and provide any immediate assistance.
Create a new safety event/incident report in the hospital's safety reporting system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Therapist opens the incident reporting module.

tasks.description: Document the details of the fall, the patient's condition, any injuries, and the actions taken. Notify the referring provider.
tasks.expected_outcome: The event is thoroughly documented for quality and risk management review.
